## QueueEventsListener.added property

Listen to 'added' event.

This event is triggered when a job is created.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
added: (args: {
        jobId: string;
        name: string;
        data: string;
        opts: string;
    }, id: string) => void;
```
